alert.note: Alert for Lac Qui Parle; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lac qui Parle and southwestern Yellow Medicine Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 908 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Canby, or 16 miles east of Clear Lake, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Porter around 920 PM CDT. This includes U.S. Highway 75 near mile marker 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Minnesota.
